decorator.name: pending

options.name: title
options.description: Optional. A title for your poll

options.name: channel
options.description: Optional. Send the poll to a different channel than this one

options.name: singlevote
options.description: Optional. Only allow one response per user

options.name: time
options.description: Optional. Automatically close the poll after this many minutes

decorator.base_description: Pre-made polls to quickly get the questions out there
